name: Stay (itch) (SvenBTB)
description:
This is a game about being there for someone, and showing solidarity to a loved one. You play as Solvej the Bluejay, as she checks in on her partner Lisa the Hummingbird. This is was made for the Stay Safe Jam in March 2020 over the course of 2 days. This is a somewhat experimental game, and we hope that you like it!

- How To Play -
Use WSAD or the Arrow Keys to move,

Use Enter or Space to move through Dialogue.

- Created by -

Eva Christensen - Story, Art, Design (https://evachristensen.itch.io/)

Stephen Beaty - Programming, Writing, Design (https://svenbtb.itch.io/)

- Platforms -

Windows PC
